Package com.tapad.tapestry

Interface Summary
TapestryCallback A callback that handles a TapestryResponse asynchronously.
 

Class Summary
BuildConfig  
Logging Enables logging or exception throwing (disabled by default) for Tapestry.
Manifest  
R  
TapestryClient A client for sending requests to the Tapestry Web API and returning responses.
TapestryError Represents an error that occurred in sending a request to Tapestry.
TapestryRequest A mutable class for building requests that are sent with TapestryClient.
TapestryResponse Contains information about this device and devices connected to it in the device graph, as a result of sending a request to TapestryClient.
TapestryService The TapestryService is a singleton (static) wrapper for the TapestryClient to provide one point of initialization.
TapestryTracking Gets hardware ids from this device for TapestryClient.
TapestryUICallback A convenience class for running callbacks in the Android UI thread.
